message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SE

The paper discusses privacy threats in emerging home automation systems and proposes a data-flow control system to enhance user privacy. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as well as human-computer interaction (cs.HC) since it involves user privacy and control. The paper also involves data analysis and processing, which could fall under the categories of social and information networks (cs.SI) and cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the paper involves system design and implementation, which could fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
